content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before making any screenshots please make sure you are allowed to do it, if you have any questions please refer to the policy below and consult with your EPAM manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WHAT TOOL TO USE FOR SCREENSHOTS SHARING?\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SnipIt (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://go/screenshots\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"go/screenshots\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") - please use this tool to upload and share screenshots internally within Google. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It allows you to manage your screenshots and add markup.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IMPORTANT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(!) Do NOT use markup feature of SnipIt tool to hide or remove access tokens, keys, PII and SPII data, and other sensitive information. This can be easily removed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(!) Do NOT send screenshots via email as an attachment. Once you sent it - you can't delete it. Use SnipIt instead.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(!) Make sure that the screenshots do NOT contain access tokens, keys, PII and SPII data, and other sensitive information before uploading the screenshots to
